body_html: Does it work if you add --config=monolithic to the bazel build command? Unfortunately we don't have that shared object working on Windows yet (waiting on Bazel support AFAIK). The only downside is that custom ops won't work with libtensorflow_cc built this way.
body_text: Does it work if you add --config=monolithic to the bazel build command? Unfortunately we don't have that shared object working on Windows yet (waiting on Bazel support AFAIK). The only downside is that custom ops won't work with libtensorflow_cc built this way.
body: Does it work if you add `--config=monolithic` to the `bazel build` command? Unfortunately we don't have that shared object working on Windows yet (waiting on Bazel support AFAIK). The only downside is that custom ops won't work with libtensorflow_cc built this way.
